00030 #include "BinaryDataEncoder.hpp"

00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace msdata {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// MSData object plus file I/O
00038 struct MSDataFile : public MSData
00039 {
00040     /// constructs MSData object backed by file;
00041     /// reader==0 -> use DefaultReaderList 
00042     MSDataFile(const std::string& filename, 
00043                const Reader* reader = 0);
00044 
00045     /// data format for write()
00046     enum Format {Format_Text, Format_mzML, Format_mzXML};
00047 
00048     /// configuration for write()
00049     struct WriteConfig
00050     {
00051         Format format;
00052         BinaryDataEncoder::Config binaryDataEncoderConfig;
00053         bool indexed;
00054 
00055         WriteConfig(Format _format = Format_mzML)
00056         :   format(_format), indexed(true)
00057         {}
00058     };
00059 
00060     /// static write function for any MSData object
00061     static void write(const MSData& msd,
00062                       const std::string& filename,
00063                       const WriteConfig& config = WriteConfig());
00064 
00065     /// member write function 
00066     void write(const std::string& filename,
00067                const WriteConfig& config = WriteConfig());
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, MSDataFile::Format format);
00072 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MSDataFile::WriteConfig& config);
00073 
00074 
00075 } // namespace msdata
00076 } // namespace pwiz
